Package tse.fise2.image3.cardmatcher.model

Class Base

java.lang.Object
tse.fise2.image3.cardmatcher.model.Base
public class Base extends Object
This class is focused on the navigation in the databases for both learning and test modes. We can find many methods managing the image displayed after clicking on the buttons in these modes.

    • displayImage

      public void displayImage(String path, javafx.scene.image.ImageView img)
      Displays an image in a given ImageView. This method is used to display the card of the database we want to focus on.
      Parameters:
      path - The path to the image file.
      img - The ImageView in which to display the image.

    • initializeList

      public void initializeList(URL arg0, ResourceBundle arg1, javafx.scene.control.ListView<String> mylistview, javafx.scene.control.Label label_title, javafx.scene.control.Label label_small_card, javafx.scene.control.Label label_current_card, javafx.scene.image.ImageView image_base, javafx.scene.image.ImageView small_img_card, String baseName)
      Initializes a ListView of strings and sets up event handlers to display an image and update labels when an item is selected.
      Parameters:
      mylistview - The ListView to be initialized.
      label_title - The label where the title of the selected image is displayed
      label_small_card - The label where the name of the corresponding image is displayed
      label_current_card - The label where the name of the selected image is displayed
      image_base - The ImageView where the selected image is displayed
      small_img_card - The ImageView where the corresponding image is displayed
      baseName - The name of the folder where the images are stored

    • displayCorres

      public void displayCorres(javafx.scene.control.Label label_title, javafx.scene.control.Label label_small_card, javafx.scene.control.Label label_current_card, javafx.scene.image.ImageView image_base, javafx.scene.image.ImageView small_img_card)
      Displays the recognized image and updates the labels. If the correspondence attribute is true, the corresponding image is displayed. Else the small image card is set to null and the title is set to "Carte SÃ©lectionnÃ©e"
      Parameters:
      label_title - The label where the title of the selected image is displayed
      label_small_card - The label where the name of the corresponding image is displayed
      label_current_card - The label where the name of the selected image is displayed
      image_base - The ImageView where the selected image is displayed
      small_img_card - The ImageView where the corresponding image is displayed

    • searchFieldProperty

      public void searchFieldProperty(javafx.scene.control.TextField search_field, javafx.scene.control.ListView<String> mylistview, String baseName)
      Displays the points of interest of the selected image and the comparison of the selected image with the corresponding image
      Parameters:
      label_current_card - The label where the name of the selected image is displayed
      label_small_card - The label where the name of the corresponding image is displayed
      small_img_card - The ImageView where the corresponding image is displayed
      image_base - The ImageView where the selected image or the comparison of the images is displayed
